attributes.action: make adultery withing marriage an illegal offence that at the minimum covers either community service or fine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adultery damages families and people's self-esteem. It is unacceptable to deliberately hurt someone's feelings in this fashion. A marriage contract should be considered a legal contract with a penalty for breaking it. If you agree there should be a punishment for adultery please sign my petition. Possible punishments might include a community service order or up to two months in prison.
